metadata.title: CVE-2024-39471 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: add error handle to avoid out-of-boundsif the sdma_v4_0_irq_id_to_seq return -EINVAL, the process shouldbe stop to avoid out-of-bounds read, so directly return -EINVAL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
